name: Peniban Quest: Sacrifice to Domina
description:
[Story]

An evil despot from an evil land has come, and she has brought ruin.
Men are succulent morsels for the sirens, women become beings of carnal lust.
The world is sure to be engulfed in the white nebulum of Maramos.
At the brink of despair, a lone hero rises.
Guided by a goddess, he embarks on his quest... of humiliating submission!

  • 100% mazo situations with NO REVERSAL!
    The hero's destiny is to get wrecked! Enemies wield strap-on dildos!
    His own beautiful party members ride his face and plumb his depths!
    Take it, take it all, and defeat the evil Argadildo!

[System]

Massive scale - 150 enemy types, 100 spells, and 250 items!!

Challenging battles - no need to deliberately lose to see the fun,
you're going to struggle to win over these brilliantly powerful ladies!

Masochist & sadist moves!
Use might, magic, c*ckrushes and tongue tactics!
Naturally, the sexy enemies use every dirty trick to dominate the hero.

Voiced H scenes!

Over 20 hours of play - from monster collecting to casino games,
there's loads of built-in side content to keep you busy!

Fast paced progress - gain XP 400% faster than the usual RPG!
No grinding (except the kind you like). No weakness due to low level
(just weakness as a shonen dominated by hotties, you masochist!)

More stuff I can't even fit in this description - visit the website!
